title: SAM
overview: A romantic psychological thriller directed Syafiq Yusof, the youngest film director in Malaysia. Set in Malaysia and starring Shaheizy Sam as Sam himself, an ordinary guy who wants to live a normal happy life with his girlfriend and soon-to-be wife Lisa (Lisa Surihani). However, Lisa is desired by many, among which includes a mentally disturbed guy named Haikal (Azad Jazmin). Their nightmare begins when Haikal makes a decision to kidnap both Sam and Lisa to take revenge for her rejection towards him. Will Sam and Lisa survive their ordeal?
storyline: Sam, who had made love to his colleague, found not only himself who liked Lisa. One day Lisa was kidnapped and Sam determined to save Lisa and look for the mastermind behind the kidnapping without knowing what he was about to change his life.
